text: @TaxReformExpert @realDonaldTrump Watch someone you love die painfully from COVID19 and you'll stop tweeting stupid shit. So many people haven't got a clue about what's really going on. People are dying and they will continue to die until scientist find a vaccine to help battle the virus. Help save us.
